thread.title: Russia approves $760 mln loan tranche to Belarus
thread.title_full: Russia approves $760 mln loan tranche to Belarus | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: Russia approves $760 mln loan tranche to Belarus
text:
MOSCOW, July 17 Russia has approved providing Belarus with a $760 million tranche from the previously agreed loan programme, the Russian government said on Friday.
The funds will be used to pay and service Belarus' debts to Russia and the Eurasian Fund for Stabilisation and Development, the government said on its website. (Reporting by Maria Kiselyova, editing by Jason Bush)
